Plot: Alexander, the King of Macedonia and one of the greatest military leaders in the history of warfare, conquers much of the known world.
Title: Alexander
Writer: Oliver Stone, Christopher Kyle, Laeta Kalogridis
Actors: Anthony Hopkins, David Bedella, Jessie Kamm, Angelina Jolie
tomatoConsensus: Even at nearly three hours long, this ponderous, talky, and emotionally distant biopic fails to illuminate Alexander's life.
Country: Germany, USA, Netherlands, France, UK, Italy
